presentation.names: I'm Godi Godi, i'm a web developper.
presentation.description: I'm a young web developper specialized in web applications using VueJs. Most people knows me as Godi Godi and call me like that. I've fell inlove with VueJs since it is light, powerfull and handy framework so i've made all my personnal projects using it.
presentation.artDescription: I'm also a graphic artist. I made digital illustration with a realistic or semi-realistic style using various tools. I got a chance to get commission with my art since 2021 as people seems to like it. I mostly do car stuff but i'm a polyvalent artist.
presentation.artistNames: I'm a Graphic artist, named HappyGodi.

cards.description: Simple inspiration from one of my friend using two tone.
Curly hair in a photo style shot illustration using exposing red color
Made at first for training, It ended up to be one of my best and favorite.
No matter the question, the answer is always miata. My OC (Original Character) with her car a NA Miata.
A Porsche 911 under some cherry blossom. beautifull scenary.
Lately, the 911 992 Porsche turbo S has gain the reputation as a monster. A more scary illustration with the purple color
Some instant inspiration from Katheryn as a model.
A real track monster made by McLaren which has became my favorite supercar.

projectList.name: My Portfolio
projectList.desc: A project to showcase my skill and showcase my projects. I have made it using Vue 3 with typescript and SCSS. The data are stored in JSON files.

projectList.name: Authentication API
projectList.desc: This is mostly a backend project i made in my third year of college. An API for a college project made using JWT, Typescript, NodeJs, ExpressJs and MongoDb.

projectList.name: To Do API
projectList.desc: This is an API for To Do app. It was basically created for learning a new web framework with a backend that uses MongoDb, Express, JWT and NodeJs. It is free to use.

technoList.name: Vue
technoList.desc: Vue Js is a powerfull, light and handy web framework that i use with Composition API combined with Typescript

technoList.name: TypeScript
technoList.desc: Basically Javascript with Types. I started using it because it is fun secure and easy to maintain than Js.

technoList.name: JavsScript
technoList.desc: One of the most popular coding language for web development. An Object Oriented Programing language which was my first programing language.

technoList.name: Sass/Scss
technoList.desc: A popular preprocessor of CSS that provides possibilities not included in CSS like functions, variable, etc... It can be very usefull for big project.

technoList.name: Html 5
technoList.desc: Hypertext Markup Language, One of the basics of web development.

technoList.name: Css 3
technoList.desc: HTML5 's binomial. CSS or Cascading Style Sheet is a styling language that pairs to HTML to get stunning result in your website.

technoList.name: Express Js
technoList.desc: Express Js is a minimalistic NodeJs backend framework that i use to build web server for applications.

technoList.name: Node Js
technoList.desc: Node Js is a development environment that allows the execution of Javascript on the server side. That is why it is mostly used to create web servers.

technoList.name: Less
technoList.desc: Less is another CSS preprocessor like Scss/Sass. It provides the same possibilities but with few differences. I did learn it during my intership in 2023.

technoList.name: MongoDB
technoList.desc: A Database Management System (DBMS) for non-relational database. It unables unstructured data storage which can be confusing.

technoList.name: MySQL
technoList.desc: MySQL, opposite to MongoDb is a DBMS for relational databases. My very first DBMS.

technoList.name: Adobe Photoshop
technoList.desc: Photoshop is a software from the Adobe suite. It is a professional and powerful software for image treatment.

technoList.name: Adobe Illustrator
technoList.desc: Illustrator, like photoshop is a software from the Adobe suite but unlike it, it is dedicated to graphic design and vector shapes.

technoList.name: Clip Studio Paint
technoList.desc: Clip Studio Paint is a dedicades drawing software tool which is one of the most complete and powerfull of its type.

technoList.name: MedibangPaint Pro
technoList.desc: MedibangPaint Pro is another dedicades drawing software. It is free and powerfull enough to get you some amazing result.
